title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 39.2 - Evidence to be presented at hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 39.2 - Evidence to be presented at hearing

State Regulations

At the hearing, the applicant shall be prepared to show
that the proposal is in the public interest and that the statements made in the
petition are true. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
39.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
